item.title: Sun Pharma Industries Added to Mojo Stocks Amid Robust Financial Performance
item.description: Sun Pharma.Inds., a leading large-cap pharmaceutical company, has been added to the prestigious Mojo Stocks list as of 11 February 2026, reflecting its strong financial performance and strategic positioning within the Pharmaceuticals & Biotechnology sector. This inclusion underscores the company’s sustained growth momentum and favourable valuation metrics, making it a compelling addition for investors seeking quality exposure in the healthcare space. Time: Feb 11 2026 11:50 PM IST

item.title: Has Aarti Pharmalabs Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Aarti Pharmalabs Ltd has declared a dividend of 30% (₹2.5 per share) with an ex-date of February 16, 2026. The company has shown varying total returns, with significant growth over the 2 and 3-year periods, but recent shorter-term returns have been negative. Time: Feb 11 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has Route Mobile Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Route Mobile Ltd has declared a dividend of 30% (₹3 per share) with an ex-date of February 13, 2026. Despite the dividend, the company has experienced significant price declines, resulting in negative total returns over various periods. Time: Feb 11 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has Uniparts India Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Uniparts India Ltd has declared a dividend of 70% (₹22.5 per share) with an ex-date of October 23, 2025. The company has shown strong total returns, particularly over the past year, with a total return of 54.15%. Time: Feb 11 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: Has DCW Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, DCW Ltd has declared a 5% dividend, with an ex-date of February 20, 2026. While recent total returns have been negative, the company has shown significant growth over the longer term, particularly a total return of 158.13% over the past 5 years. Time: Feb 11 2026 11:31 PM IST

item.title: B.L.Kashyap Added to Hidden Turnarounds List Following Strong Quarterly Performance
item.description: B.L.Kashyap, a micro-cap construction company, has been newly added to the Hidden Turnarounds list as of 11 February 2026, following a remarkable improvement in its financial performance for the quarter ended December 2025. The stock’s recent surge in profitability and operational efficiency positions it as a compelling candidate for investors seeking early-stage turnaround opportunities in the construction sector. Time: Feb 11 2026 11:30 PM IST
